parameters.name: InstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the instance for which you want to configure fine-grained monitoring.

parameters.name: InstanceType
parameters.description: The instance type. Set the value to **EIP**.

parameters.name: LogProject
parameters.description: The name of the Simple Log Service (SLS) project.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region ID of the instance.

You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to query the most recent region list.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of fine-grained monitoring. Valid values:

*   **ON**
*   **OFF**
